p: Patients’ immunosuppressant regimen with cyclosporine A at 15 mg/kg/day and indomethacin at 225 mg/day was started 10 days prior to surgery, and continued for 1 month post-operatively. A wide spectrum antibiotic was given pre-operatively and 48 h post-operatively (Cefuroxime, 750 mg IV every 8 h in hospital, and orally at discharge). Antiparkinsonian medications were adjusted to patients’ requirements.
